body_text_content.html: These sculptures explore the typographic detail found in various weights of Univers, with the process mirroring Frutiger’s initial drawings. As the typeface takes on a new 3-dimensional form, the objects are created by hand and eye without calculation or mechanical precision.
body_text_content.text: These sculptures explore the typographic detail found in various weights of Univers, with the process mirroring Frutiger’s initial drawings. As the typeface takes on a new 3-dimensional form, the objects are created by hand and eye without calculation or mechanical precision.
